###4.12
Variable Browser
The Variable Browser lets you change variable values by entering new values in the right column. 
Select "Variable Browser" from the Views menu.
As you can see the Variable Browser now appears in the center of the window.  You can change the format of the variable values using the format menu.
Right-click anywhere in the Result (right) column of the Variable Browser to display the Format menu.  When you are finished click on the bottom right arrow to continue.

Disassembly View
Exception View
Execution View
Expression View

Memory View

Register View
